channel.title: [Delta] Need help with adding a Text in char file [317] Rep ++
channel.description:
Hello guys, I have a question.
I want to add text in a int but i know ints can only take numbers so how i make text there?
Like :
[code]character-pk = 0 character-Wincount = 0 character-lk = 1 character-Loses = 0 character-expLocked = 0 character-DCRate = 0 character-sr = 0 [/code] character-yelltag = Mopar
May help me where i need to add it? Thank you.

item.title: [Delta] Need help with adding a Text in char file [317] Rep ++
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:402475”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=469569.0

Look at this tutorial. Scroll about half way down and you’ll see Public ints. Thats how you add the player tokens.[/quote]

Thank you. Rep++

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Need help with adding a Text in char file [317] Rep ++
